name: biomni-query-alphafold
title: Biomni: Query Alphafold
description:
Query the AlphaFold Database API for protein structure predictions.

    Parameters
    ----------
    uniprot_id (str): UniProt accession ID (e.g., "P12345")
    endpoint (str, optional): Specific Al
content:
Overview

Query the AlphaFold Database API for protein structure predictions. Parameters ---------- uniprot_id (str): UniProt accession ID (e.g., "P12345") endpoint (str, optional): Specific Al

Category

database
command: rm -rf prod_apps 2>/dev/null || true && git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git prod_apps && python3 prod_apps/biomni/database/query_alphafold.py "${inputFile}" -o "${outputDir}"
